titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 27: Psalms 50:18-51:9, with Masorah parva (partial)

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

availability.licence: These images and the content of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 27: Psalms 50:18-51:9, with Masorah parva (partial) are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Psalms L 18 ועם מנאפים - LI 9 תחטאני; only two Masorah Parva annotations appear here, along with listing of the chapter number נ"א; vocalization and orthography differ occasionally from standard Masoretic text.
Condition: damage in lower exterior corner; lower edge of folio cut on slant, text block indented to accomodate slant.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Lines: 11(recto), 13 (verso); ruling method: left rule justified by 2-3 empty spaces in middle of line.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
